item.title: Predicting residential property prices in Bratislava using recipes - Linear regression (part I)
item.author: michal.kapusta@gmail.com (Michal Kapusta)
item.description: The goal of the post In this blogpost, i will be predicting the residential prices in the city of Bratislava (Slovakian capital). In order to access real world data I will be scraping data from property listing website.
